title: Public Preview footer note across the app

requirements.summary: Add a Public Preview note to the global footer while preserving the existing compliance disclaimer text unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: The footer renders the note exactly as: "PulseBrief is in public preview. Some features are limited. Pro (Â£19/month) coming soon."
The note is visible in the footer on all routes/pages where the existing footer is shown (e.g., Landing and AppShell pages).
The existing compliance disclaimer text remains unchanged and continues to read exactly: "Informational only. Not financial advice."
No other user-facing copy, features, access logic, or page layouts are modified beyond adding this footer note.

file_operations.description: Insert the Public Preview note text into the existing footer layout so it appears wherever DisclaimerBar is rendered (LandingPage and AppShell). Keep the compliance disclaimer paragraph copy exactly unchanged: "Informational only. Not financial advice."
